title: Absolutely horrifying
review: I had mixed feelings on this film before going to view it. As expected, Gabriel Byrne did an excellent job, and was one of the best parts of this movie. I do believe the soda fountain at the concession stand being out of lemonade was truly the scariest thing about Hereditary. I am not sure where these people are coming up with such great things to say. It was a slow-paced snooze-fest that had more laughs than scares. Just because you can make a movie does not mean you should...Save your money and time
